# tan()

**Instance Method**

Computes tangent of the tensor’s elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func tan() -> MLTensor
```

## Applying trigonometric functions

- **cos()**: Computes the cosine of the tensor’s elements.
- **cosh()**: Computes the hyperbolic cosine of the tensor’s elements.
- **acos()**: Computes the inverse cosine of the tensor’s elements.
- **acosh()**: Computes the inverse hyperbolic cosine of the tensor’s elements.
- **sin()**: Computes sine of the tensor’s elements.
- **sinh()**: Computes hyperbolic sine of the tensor’s elements.
- **asin()**: Computes the inverse sine of the tensor’s elements.
- **asinh()**: Computes the inverse hyperbolic sine of the tensor’s elements.
- **tanh()**: Computes hyperbolic tangent of the tensor’s elements.
- **atan()**: Computes the inverse tangent of the tensor’s elements.
- **atanh()**: Computes the inverse hyperbolic tangent of the tensor’s elements.
